reviewText: Got this for a co-worker's child. I'm sure it got the kid's good video viewing seal of approval.
My sons says it starts and stops a lot.  No scratches found.  Not sure what is wrong.

Hi! I am back for more reviews on Pooh and Rio products. Today I am reviewing Rio sing along songs. I bought this earlier  at  Walmart and thought it would be like the Winnie the Pooh VHS Sing a Song With Pooh. But it wasn't. It was the movie with a sing along MODE. I was tricked into buying another copy of Rio 2 by Fox. I expected it to be where you follow the bouncing ball or the light up words like in the Disney Sing Along Songs videos. Upset but can;t complain because I still love it.

This one gets four stars because of misunderstanding and false advertising.
Bought for my son he absolutely loves.

My 20 month old loves this move. He loves all the music and the bright colors. The first movie was good but this is one of the very rare cases that the sequel is better than the original. It keeps the little ones entertained but it has a fun story that the whole family can enjoy.
Perfect! my kids love this movie! It has the sing-along option. Or you can watch it without the sing-along words as a regular movie. It is cheaper than buying the regular Rio 2 movie. Win win!
Amazing
Not much different from the original movie.
Good movie but the piture in sound is no good
Children love this movie, my daughter watches the musical over and over again and sings along with it.
Cheaper than buying the movie alone, and this has the movie and the sing along.
